channel.title: Customizing Whonix
channel.description:
I installed Qubes-Whonix because I want to use Whonix.
I have heard that it is best to use Whonix as default without any changes, but the default Whonix lacks fonts and text input in my native language, so I want to install it. And I also want to install ublock in Torbrowser, and save bookmarks. What kind of danger would I be putting Whonix at by doing this?
What should I take care of to use Whonix safely?
Do you guys really use the default settings? Especially without adblocker, isn't it frustrating to use the Internet?

item.title: Customizing Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
QuWh:

I have heard that it is best to use Whonix as default without any changes, but the default Whonix lacks fonts and text input in my native language, so I want to install it. And I also want to install ublock in Torbrowser, and save bookmarks.
What kind of danger would I be putting Whonix at by doing this?

See https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Unsafe_Tor_Browser_Habits

Same as Tor Browser.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies.

QuWh:

What should I take care of to use Whonix safely?

Whonix – 18 Jun 22

Whonix ™ Documentation

A Crash Course in Anonymity and Security on the Internet.

Read full topic

I installed Qubes-Whonix because I want to use Whonix.

I have heard that it is best to use Whonix as default without any changes, but the default Whonix lacks fonts and text input in my native language, so I want to install it. And I also want to install ublock in Torbrowser, and save bookmarks.
